trans-unit.source: Represents a method that handles the <xref href="System.AppDomain.TypeResolve"></xref>, <xref href="System.AppDomain.ResourceResolve"></xref>, or <xref href="System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um método que manipula o <xref href="System.AppDomain.TypeResolve"> </xref>, <xref href="System.AppDomain.ResourceResolve"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an assembly, type, or resource, the corresponding events are raised to give the callback a chance to tell the runtime which assembly the referenced assembly, type, or resource is in.
trans-unit.target: Se o carregador de classe de tempo de execução não pode resolver uma referência a um assembly, tipo ou recurso, os eventos correspondentes são gerados para dar o retorno de chamada a oportunidade para informar o tempo de execução qual assembly do assembly referenciado, tipo ou recurso está em.

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the ResolveEventHandler to return the assembly that resolves the type, assembly, or resource, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized.
trans-unit.target: É responsabilidade do ResolveEventHandler para retornar o assembly que resolve o tipo, assembly ou recurso, ou para retornar null se o assembly não é reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and the <xref:System.AppDomain.ResourceResolve?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyAssemblyResolve?displayProperty=fullName> events.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Resolvendo carregamentos de Assembly](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e <xref:System.AppDomain.ResourceResolve?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyAssemblyResolve?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyAssemblyResolve?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomain.ResourceResolve?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the ResolveEventHandler event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Começando com o [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], o ResolveEventHandler é gerado para todos os assemblies, incluindo módulos de recursos.

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores, o evento não foi gerado para módulos de recursos.

trans-unit.source: If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain.
trans-unit.target: Se o sistema operacional está localizado, o manipulador pode ser chamado várias vezes: uma vez para cada cultura na cadeia de fallback.

trans-unit.source: Every derived class of <xref:System.Delegate> and <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> has a constructor and an `Invoke` method.
trans-unit.target: Cada classe derivada de <xref:System.Delegate>e <xref:System.MulticastDelegate>possui um construtor e um `Invoke` método.</xref:System.MulticastDelegate> </xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: See the C++ code example in the description for the <xref:System.Delegate> class.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o exemplo de código C++ na descrição para a <xref:System.Delegate>classe.</xref:System.Delegate>
